content: designed for darn knit anyway makers league february project chunky yarn + easy stranded colorwork = a hat you will love you can get two hats out of these two skeins if you reduce the number of row between the chart and the first decrease row or maybe on the 2nd hat remove the bottom row of hearts give it a try click here t 1 o see the kits 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/makers-league/february/p/lover-it-hat-x78937836 htm
